name: North ɥʇnoS
description:
An experimental game where you are probably doing it right if your controller is upside down. Quickly and correctly orient the controller in your hands and use your twitchy input skills to achieve the fastest time.

Initial idea made at Exile Jam, fall 2015:
Game - Simon Stålhandske
Sounds - Andreas Lagerstedt
Model - 3dregenerator
